overview: A fantasy story took place in an unknown futuristic time, after many wars and deadly pandemics that lasted for decades, an expedition from outside the planet is trying to find the living remains of the human race on planet Earth, the inevitable message of these kinds of stories is well known and anticipates the end of humanity. A SOLAV STUDIOS PRODUCTION WRITTEN BY:  KHALIL SAEED RIZQ AND MAHER ASAAD BAKER PRODUCED BY:  FUAD AL-QRIZE ANIMATION SUPERVISOR:  YAZAN MAHER BAKER DIRECTED BY: MAHER ASAAD BAKER
title: Extinction
